alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Lyon (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 29 at 5:02PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LYON AND NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 501 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arco, or 18 miles west of Marshall, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 455 CDT, quarter sized hail was reported 3 miles southwest of Arco. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Lyon and northeastern Lincoln Counties. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
